name: places/ChIJDxBI_y33wokR-XtIY1w7XWo
formattedAddress: 64 W 116th St, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 64 W 116th St, New York, NY 10026, USA

originalText.text:
I have been a faithful customer of this hair braiding shop for more than two years, and I have always been satisfied with the quality of their work. Even though their prices are higher compared to other places, I never minded paying extra because the results were worth it. But lately, I have been experiencing disappointments.
I paid over $350 for waist-length small Fulani braids in the front and knotless braids in the back. Unfortunately, the braids turned out uneven, with some being the correct small size and others medium-sized. My hair started coming out of the braids the very next day after I got them done. I tried to contact them for two weeks, and after a long wait, I finally got an appointment to come back and have them corrected. To be fair to them, when they finally responded and they did apologize for the quality of the braids.
The braider's attitude was also unnecessary the first time when I pointed out that the size and color I requested were not what was being done. She asked if I wanted her to stop and I told her I just wanted the size and color I wanted. She then told me that I was looking in the mirror while she was braiding and that if I kept looking in the mirror, she could stop if I wanted her too. It was passive-aggressive because why wouldn't I look to ensure I was getting what I wanted, especially with the first few braids being the wrong color and size? After I complained about the first braids not being what I requested, she finally stopped to mix the color but left the braids with the wrong color. It was a terrible experience to get what I booked an appointment for, and I had never had that issue before. The second time around, they did a terrible job, leaving even more of my own hair out of the braids, even though I had requested them to braid all my hair.
Several people came into the shop to complain about braids falling apart within a day or two of installation. One customer was even told that she could not get the braids she wanted, and when she declined and requested a refund, they told her no because she did not send pictures of her hair in advance. She showed that she did email the pictures based on the required forms they send after booking, but still had to wait nearly 10 minutes for them to tell her they would process a refund in a week.
As someone who has been a loyal customer for over two years, I am disappointed with the recent quality of service.

originalText.text: I Had A Very Lovely Experience Getting My Hair Braided For The First Time . The Staff Are Very Professional , Kind And Accommodating ! Astou Did An Amazing Job , She Gracefully Took Her Time To Make My Hair Perfect , Constantly Checked On Me , Offered Beverages And Drinks . She Was Very Thoughtful And Kind , Which I Appreciated, It Made This New Experience Smooth And Easy . originalText.text:
Excellent styling, braiding. Highly recommend stylist - Maya. She was very personable and professional - followed exact style I requested (versatile fulani with small braids) with pre-washed, custom color combo hair. Also provided maintenance suggestions. Would definitely come back.
Removing 1 star - overall salon cleanliness.

text.text:
Excellent styling, braiding. Highly recommend stylist - Maya. She was very personable and professional - followed exact style I requested (versatile fulani with small braids) with pre-washed, custom color combo hair. Also provided maintenance suggestions. Would definitely come back.
Removing 1 star - overall salon cleanliness.

originalText.text: Quick and skilled braiders. Need to write in the comments when making appointment what length do you want especially for large box braids because the default is waist length. heavy on the blue magic which is what they use when making their parts rather than gel. Would recommend asking them to use less when making your braids.

originalText.text: Fatou did an amazing job and is so sweet. She kept checking on me to make sure I was okay. She is very detail oriented and took her time perfecting every single braid. Thank you so much!
